task: SCAFFOLD a simple Tasks frontend UI with only one page

planning.name: agent-a
planning.objective: Set up the single-page app shell: entrypoint, root mount, dependency setup, and route/render entry so the Tasks page is the default and only route.

planning.name: agent-b
planning.objective: Create the one-page Tasks interface with page-level layout, task form controls (create/view placeholders), and static task sections.

planning.name: agent-c
planning.objective: Implement reusable UI pieces for the page (task row, task list, section header, action buttons) and compose them into the Tasks page.

planning.name: agent-d
planning.objective: Add baseline styling and responsive behavior for the Tasks page, including card/list/table-like layout, spacing, typography, and mobile adjustments.
